laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Feces test for C. difficile toxin A & B
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).

Lung volumes are still low. Improved ventilation at the lung bases. Unchanged position of the right central venous access line. Unchanged moderate cardiomegaly. Unchanged plate-like atelectasis at the left lung apex.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved ventilation at the lung bases compared to previous radiograph.
